org.trianacode.taskgraph

Interface Task

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Tool
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    TaskGraph
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRunnableTask, AbstractServiceTask, NonRunnableTask, PoisonTask, RunnableTask, TaskGraphImp, TaskImp

    public interface Task
extends Tool
    The interface to tasks within a taskgraph

      • init

        void init()
          throws TaskException
        Initialisation method is called immediately after the parent is set
        Throws:
        TaskException

      • setParent

        void setParent(TaskGraph taskgraph)
        Sets the parent for this task

      • getNodeIndex

        int getNodeIndex(Node node)
        Returns the index of the specified node within the data input/output and parameter input/output nodes; or -1 if not attached to this task. The index returned is not unique, e.g. the first data input node and the first data output nodes will both return 0.

      • getAbsoluteNodeIndex

        int getAbsoluteNodeIndex(Node node)
        This is a convience method to provide backward compatibility with TrianaGUI, in which parameter nodes where indexed after data nodes.

        The absolute index of a data node is the same as its standard index. The absolute index of a parameter node is its standard index + the total number of data input nodes.

        Returns:
        the absolute index of this node within its associated task.

      • isDataInputNode

        boolean isDataInputNode(Node node)
        Returns:
        true if the specified node is a data input node for this task

      • isDataOutputNode

        boolean isDataOutputNode(Node node)
        Returns:
        true if the specified node is a data output node for this task
